segments.text: I need to see if I qualify for a home loan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can help you . How much money do you make per year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I make around one hundred thousand dollars per year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you been on your current job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have only worked at this job for 6 months , but I have a longer job history elsewhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any other outside income from rental property or a trust ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I only receive my salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know your credit score ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that it is around 600 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By crunching the numbers and putting in your expenses , I estimate that you can afford a house of around five hundred thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
